item.title: SDKs
item.description: The chifra serve command provides an API interface to chifra. As part of this functionality, we’ve started writing SDKs to make using the API easier. There are two SDKs so far, both in their earliest stages. The two SDKs are the TypeScript SDK and the Python SDK. We welcome PRs supporting other languages – particularly GoLang or Rust. Here’s the SDKs repo.

item.title: Typescript SDK
item.description: Here’s a link to the TypeScript SDK. Warning: It’s in its very early stage.

item.title: Python SDK
item.description: Here’s a link to the Python SDK. Warning: It’s in its very early stage.
